title: ZK I Zettel 7,2m26c - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
7,2m26c
					Caplow, S. 2: "Institutional values usually presentrather striking inconsistencies. In the first place, they are notwholly explicit, being roughly summarized fromorganizational behavior, or deduced from ritual formular, or both. Because institutions change rather slowly, andbecause the circumstances of a mobile, secular societyallow different phases of an institution to change in differentdirections at varying rates, it usually comes about thatthe values of predominant institutions embody absoluteinconsistencies" usw. Davon unterscheidet Caplow analytisch die Betrachtungsebeneder Organisation, auf der diese inconsistencies als funktions-widrig (Bestands- und Erfolgsschädlich) nach Möglichkeiteingedämmt und vermindert werden.
